code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../styles/Categories.css';import ElectronicsSection from'../ElectronicsSection';import ShoesSection from'../ShoesSection';import Artwork from'./Artwork';import Book from'./Book';import ClothesSection from'./ClothesSection';function Categories(){const categories=["Clothes","Shoes","Artwork","Electronics","Books"];const[activeCategory,setActiveCategory]=useState(null);const handleCategoryClick=category=>{setActiveCategory(category);};const renderCategoryContent=()=>{switch(activeCategory){case"Clothes":return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(ClothesSection,null);case"Electronics":return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(ElectronicsSection,null);case"Shoes":return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(ShoesSection,null);case"Artwork":return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Artwork,null);case"Books":return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Book,null);default:return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,"Please select a category.");}};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"categories-container"},categories.map((category,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{key:index,className:`category-item ${activeCategory===category?'active':''}`,onClick:()=>handleCategoryClick(category)},category," ",/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"dropdown-icon"},"\u25BC")))),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"category-content"},renderCategoryContent()));};export default Categories;
